topics.title: Consequences of Incorrect Wiring
topics.description: The speaker warns that getting the wiring wrong can lead to a nasty explosion and poor power supply.
evidence_quotes: Then chances are you're going to have a nasty explosion on your hands.
But does make for a rather poor power supply.

topics.title: Importance of Correct Wiring
topics.description: The speaker emphasizes the importance of correct wiring when it comes to electrolytic capacitors. They are polarity sensitive, and getting it backwards can cause a nasty explosion.
evidence_quotes: Make sure you wire them the correct way.
And if you get it backwards.
